mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT wc.external_userid FROM we_customer wc LEFT JOIN we_group_member wgm ON wgm.user_id = wc.external_userid LEFT JOIN we_group wg ON wg.chat_id = wgm.chat_id LEFT JOIN we_group_code_actual wgca ON wgca.chat_id = wg.chat_id LEFT JOIN we_pres_tag_group wptg ON wptg.group_code_id = wgca.group_code_id WHERE wptg.task_id = #{taskId}

SELECT wc.`name`, 0 AS is_sent, ( SELECT count(1) > 0 FROM we_customer wc1 LEFT JOIN we_group_member wgm ON wgm.user_id = wc1.external_userid LEFT JOIN we_group wg ON wg.chat_id = wgm.chat_id LEFT JOIN we_group_code_actual wgca ON wgca.chat_id = wg.chat_id LEFT JOIN we_pres_tag_group wptg1 ON wptg1.group_code_id = wgca.group_code_id WHERE wc1.external_userid = wptgs.external_userid ) AS is_in_group FROM we_pres_tag_group_stat wptgs LEFT JOIN we_pres_tag_group wptg ON wptgs.task_id = wptg.task_id LEFT JOIN we_customer wc ON wc.external_userid = wptgs.external_userid WHERE wptgs.task_id = #{taskId}
